column1: The Pit Room////Went to the pit room last night and got 2lbs of Brisket and some Mac and cheese to go. The Mac and cheese was fantastic
column2: as always. But not sure what happened to the brisket. As we have been here before and loved our experience. However
column3: this trip the brisket was severally under cooked. Rubber. Not good. Not sure if this place is on a downward spiral. But that was bad. I felt cheated when I'm served that poor of a quality Brisket at $20+ a lb. We will not be returning after being served that.
